About:

This fuzzy matching tool is based on the Levenshtein string distance ratio.

This tool was build using Go for the backend API part and Javascript with Webpack for the frontend client part.

Checkout the Github repository if you want to find out more on how this tool is build.

Checkout this Github repository if you want to find out more on the available matching modes.

Known gotchas:

  • When running this tool from mobile IOS Safari, make sure to turn-off the keyboard accents if you need the double-quotes in your strings.
  • Internet Explorer is not supported.
